title: Portfolio
overview: This is the new version of my portfolio website created using Next.js framework.

images.alt: Image showing the home page of the portfolio website.

title: WeDD.ca
overview: For our capstone project, we developed a ride booking service for a company called WeDD. It was developed using React.js, Express.js, Node.js and MySQL database. WeDD is a multiuser and multi-role application where customers, drivers and administrators can interact and use features their role allows them, simultaneously.

images.alt: Image showing the home page wedd web application.
Image showing the login page wedd web application.
Image showing the signup page wedd web application.

title: Age Calculator
overview: A simple yet useful android app which converts your age into minutes. It offers you the feature to choose your date of birth, the month and the year from the calender. After you have selected the date and pressed OK, it will show you the results of your selection.

images.alt: Image showing the entry screen of age calculator mobile application.

title: Connect
overview: Connect is a real time full stack chat application which runs on PHP. It is connected to the MySQL database for storing user's personal information and their messages. It uses JavaScript to handle user inputs on the front-end to send information to PHP through AJAX and update the front-end over frequent intervals of time.

images.alt: Image showing the home screen of connect web application.
Image showing one of the chat's screen in connect web application.
Image showing the signup page of connect web application.

title: MyInventory
overview: This is one of my full stack side projects. myinventory is an inventory managing web application, which is designed using JavaScript framework React.js for the front-end and Node.js which uses Express.js library for back-end. It uses MySQL to store users and their inventory information in the database.

images.alt: Image showing the inventory page of myinventory web application.
